CLUE: Link to open valve in internal combustion engine
OUTPUT: ['Emily Wilson, I can explain that the link to open the valve in an internal combustion engine is the camshaft', 'As the camshaft rotates, it moves the valve lifters, which in turn open and close the valves', 'Valve springs: These keep the valves closed when the engine is not running and ensure they open properly when the camshaft rotates.', 'Valve lifters: These are the components that connect the camshaft to the valves, transferring the motion of the camshaft to open and close the valves.', 'Valve followers: These are the components that keep the valves in proper alignment with the camshaft and ensure they open and close smoothly.', 'Understanding the function of these components and how they work together is essential for maintaining and optimizing the performance of the engine.']
